title: Lets hope for a capsule
body:
So its been idk maybe 2 weeks and i havent got a single capsule, while my friend got 3 in a week with 5 key fragments. So what is the problem with me not getting capsule and im honor lvl 4, i mean what is it Riot u dont like me :P? jk its just whats the problem with me not getting capsules?
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body:
Hmmmmm if you haven't gotten keys in that long, I wonder if it's possible that you've already reached the [**key limit for the month**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115008474148). 

> If I received all of my key fragments for this month can I still get a capsule?
> 
> No. Capsule drops are very rare and it’s not guaranteed that you will get one every month. Currently, every time you get a key fragment drop, there's a chance that it will be upgraded to a capsule. For extremely high engagers (if you don’t sleep and only play ^^ ) there's a chance to earn up to 4 keys (12 fragments) in a 4 week period. Even then, you could end up with a short dry spell at the end of the month.
